title: User Authentication with valid credentials and 2FA
description: Verify that a user can successfully login using valid username and password followed by correct 2FA verification.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Click login button
Verify 2FA prompt is displayed
Enter valid 2FA code
Verify user is successfully logged in and redirected appropriately

title: User Authentication failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails when an incorrect username/email or password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username/email or password
Click login button
Verify login failure message is shown and user is not authenticated

title: Lead Lifecycle Management - Create, update, delete leads
description: Verify that leads can be created, updated, and deleted correctly including lifecycle stage changes.

steps.description: Navigate to Leads page
Create a new lead with valid data
Verify the new lead appears in the leads list and Kanban board
Update lead information and move to next sales stage
Verify lead information and stage are updated correctly
Delete the lead
Verify lead no longer exists in the system

title: Lead Data Import with duplicate detection
description: Verify that importing leads from file works properly and duplicate leads are detected and handled.

steps.description: Navigate to Leads Import functionality
Upload valid leads import file that contains duplicates
Verify system detects duplicates and prompts user with duplicate warning
Complete import process
Verify leads are imported correctly without creating duplicate entries

title: Dynamic Lead Capture Form submission and public accessibility
description: Verify public users can access dynamic lead capture forms and successfully submit valid lead data.

steps.description: Access dynamic lead capture form public URL
Verify form loads without errors and fields match form configuration
Fill in valid lead details in the form
Submit the form
Verify submission is accepted and confirmation is displayed
Check lead is created in system with submitted details

title: Customer & Contact Management CRUD operations
description: Validate the creation, update, deletion, and retrieval of customers and associated contacts.

steps.description: Navigate to Customers page
Create a new customer record with valid data
Verify customer creation success and record appears in the list
Add a contact person linked to the new customer
Verify contact is saved and linked correctly
Update customer and contact information
Verify updates persist and display correctly
Delete contact and customer records
Verify records are removed successfully without orphan data

title: Product and Inventory Management with import and tracking
description: Verify product creation, import functions, and inventory tracking updates are consistent across the system.

steps.description: Navigate to Product catalog page
Create a new product entry with all required fields
Validate product appears in catalog and inventory with correct details
Import multiple products from valid import file
Verify products are imported without data loss or duplication
Adjust inventory levels and track stock updates
Confirm inventory levels update correctly and reflected in UI

title: Sales Document workflows - creation, PDF generation, and conversion
description: Validate creation and conversion flows for Quotes, Proforma Invoices, Sales Orders, and Invoices including PDF generation and sequential numbering.

steps.description: Create new sales document (Quote)
Verify sales document fields save correctly and displays in list
Generate PDF for the sales document
Verify PDF generates correctly with accurate data and formatting
Convert Quote to Proforma Invoice and then to Sales Order
Verify conversions maintain integrity, sequential SRPL IDs, and correct statuses
Convert Sales Order to Invoice and generate Invoice PDF
Validate invoice creation, ID, and PDF correctness

title: Workflow Automation trigger on lead status change
description: Verify that workflow automation rules trigger expected actions when a lead changes sales stages.

steps.description: Configure a workflow automation rule for lead stage change
Change lead stage to trigger automation
Verify automation actions such as notifications or status updates execute as configured

title: Session Management and Security Features including login activity tracking
description: Validate session creation, timeout, multiple sessions handling, and audit log entries for login activities including IP geolocation.

steps.description: Login with a valid user account
Verify session is recorded and active
Open a second session with same user
Verify multiple sessions are tracked and managed correctly
Wait for session timeout period or manually trigger logout
Verify session invalidation and user is logged out
Check security audit logs for login, logout, and IP details
Verify logs record appropriate entries with geolocation and user-agent data

title: Global Search accuracy and performance
description: Verify that the global search command bar returns accurate, relevant results promptly across all entities.

steps.description: Open global search command bar
Input search keyword covering leads, customers, deals, products, and documents
Validate that search results contain correct matching records from all entities
Verify search response time is within acceptable limits for usability
Use command bar interface features like keyboard shortcuts and filters
Ensure interface responds correctly and filters narrow results as expected

title: Data Hygiene - Duplicate detection and stale record identification
description: Test detection of duplicate entities and stale records for leads and customers and verify accurate warnings with no false positives.

steps.description: Create several leads with similar or identical data to test duplicate detection
Verify duplicates are detected and appropriate warnings are provided
Mark some leads as stale by avoiding updates past configured threshold
Confirm stale record identification and that stale leads are flagged correctly
Test manual resolution or merging options for duplicates
Verify deduplication updates data correctly without loss

title: Document Management - Upload, versioning, virus scanning, and access control
description: Verify documents can be uploaded, versions managed, virus scanned automatically, and access permissions enforced securely.

steps.description: Upload a document file to the system
Verify upload succeeds and virus scan passes
Upload an updated version of the document
Validate versioning increments and history is maintained
Attempt to access document with user lacking permissions
Verify access is denied enforcing access control
Access document with authorized user
Confirm authorized access is permitted

title: Reporting & Analytics data accuracy and filtering
description: Validate generated reports and dashboards show correct and up-to-date sales, product performance, and customer analytics with filtering applied.

steps.description: Navigate to various reporting dashboards
Apply filters for date ranges, product categories, and sales stages
Verify reports update dynamically reflecting filtered data
Cross-check report data accuracy against known source data

title: Responsive UI across desktop and mobile devices
description: Verify that UI layout, navigation, and components render correctly and are usable on various screen sizes and devices.

steps.description: Open main application on desktop browser
Verify UI elements align correctly and navigation works as expected
Open the application on various mobile screen sizes (emulated or real devices)
Confirm responsive layout, legible text, and usable navigation components
Interact with key UI components such as Kanban boards, tables, forms, and modals
Ensure interactive components function without errors

title: Role-Based Access Control enforcement for restricted actions
description: Verify users with different roles and permissions have appropriate access rights and restrictions throughout the application.

steps.description: Login as user with admin role
Verify access to full functionality including user & role management pages
Login as user with limited role (e.g. sales rep)
Verify restricted access to admin features and ability to perform only authorized actions
Attempt to perform unauthorized action with limited role
Confirm action is blocked and error or access denied message is shown

title: Payment Tracking - Add and reconcile payments with sales orders
description: Validate that payments can be recorded, linked to sales orders, and reconciled correctly with financial data.

steps.description: Navigate to Payments Received page
Add a new payment entry for an existing sales order
Verify payment details are saved and linked to correct sales order
Perform reconciliation and check updated balance on sales order
Confirm financial data consistency and payment reflected in reports

title: Dispatch Register - Record and track shipment status updates
description: Verify logistics tracking by adding dispatch records and updating shipment statuses is functioning and data are presented correctly.

steps.description: Access Dispatch Register page
Add a dispatch record for shipment with valid details
Confirm dispatch record is saved and displayed correctly
Update shipment status and log tracking information
Verify status updates display correctly and logs are recorded

title: Audit Logging of critical system changes
description: Verify audit logs capture create, update, delete actions across key entities including user details and timestamps.

steps.description: Perform create, update, and delete operations on leads, customers, and products
Verify audit logs record operations accurately with correct user and timestamp information
Check audit log interface and query logs by entity and date
Confirm audit logs are accessible and filterable for review

title: Password Reset flow with email verification
description: Validate that users can request a password reset, receive email, and set new password securely.

steps.description: Navigate to password reset request page
Submit valid email address for password reset
Verify confirmation of password reset request is shown
Access password reset link received by email
Enter and confirm new valid password
Verify password reset success and user can login with new password
